elementary.title: Explain to a Friend
elementary.objective: Write a prompt asking AI to explain what a computer is to someone who has never seen one.

rubric.clarity: Your prompt is easy to understand (0-25 pts)
rubric.audience: You mentioned who the explanation is for (0-25 pts)
rubric.completeness: The AI's answer covers what a computer is and does (0-25 pts)
rubric.quality: The explanation would make sense to your friend (0-25 pts)

hints: Think about what your friend doesn't know

elementary.title: Story Starter
elementary.objective: Write a prompt asking AI to start a story about a friendly robot who goes to school.

rubric.clarity: Your prompt tells AI what kind of story you want (0-25 pts)
rubric.audience: The story is appropriate for kids your age (0-25 pts)
rubric.completeness: The story mentions the robot and school (0-25 pts)
rubric.quality: The story is interesting and fun to read (0-25 pts)

elementary.title: Animal Facts
elementary.objective: Write a prompt asking AI to share 3 cool facts about your favorite animal.

rubric.clarity: You named a specific animal (0-25 pts)
rubric.audience: You asked for facts a kid could understand (0-25 pts)
rubric.completeness: AI gave you 3 different facts (0-25 pts)
rubric.quality: The facts are interesting and true (0-25 pts)

hints: Pick one animal you really like

elementary.title: Homework Helper
elementary.objective: Write a prompt asking AI to help you understand why we have seasons (spring, summer, fall, winter).

rubric.clarity: Your question is clear about what you want to know (0-25 pts)
rubric.audience: You asked for an explanation you can understand (0-25 pts)
rubric.completeness: The answer explains why seasons happen (0-25 pts)
rubric.quality: You could explain this to a classmate now (0-25 pts)

middle.title: Science Explainer
middle.objective: Write a prompt asking AI to explain photosynthesis in a way a 5th grader could understand, using an analogy.

rubric.clarity: Prompt clearly requests explanation with analogy (0-25 pts)
rubric.audience: Specified the target audience level (0-25 pts)
rubric.completeness: Response covers the key parts of photosynthesis (0-25 pts)
rubric.quality: The analogy makes the concept easier to understand (0-25 pts)

hints: Ask for a comparison to something familiar

middle.title: Essay Brainstormer
middle.objective: Write a prompt asking AI to help you brainstorm ideas for a persuasive essay about why schools should have longer lunch breaks.

rubric.clarity: Prompt specifies the essay topic and type (0-25 pts)
rubric.audience: Mentioned this is for a school assignment (0-25 pts)
rubric.completeness: AI provided multiple distinct arguments (0-25 pts)
rubric.quality: The ideas are logical and could be developed into paragraphs (0-25 pts)

hints: Ask for both reasons and evidence

middle.title: Code Debugger
middle.objective: Write a prompt sharing a simple piece of code that has a bug, and ask AI to find and fix it.

rubric.clarity: Prompt includes the code and asks for help (0-25 pts)
rubric.completeness: AI identified the specific bug (0-25 pts)
rubric.quality: AI explained why it was wrong and how to fix it (0-25 pts)

hints: Describe what should happen vs what happens

middle.title: History Interview
middle.objective: Write a prompt asking AI to respond as if it were a historical figure you're studying, answering questions about their life.

rubric.clarity: Named a specific historical figure (0-25 pts)
rubric.audience: Asked appropriate questions for a school project (0-25 pts)
rubric.completeness: AI stayed in character and answered factually (0-25 pts)
rubric.quality: Responses were educational and engaging (0-25 pts)

hints: Ask about their challenges and achievements

highschool.title: Research Synthesizer
highschool.objective: Write a prompt asking AI to summarize the main arguments for and against social media's impact on teen mental health.

rubric.clarity: Prompt requests balanced coverage of multiple perspectives (0-25 pts)
rubric.audience: Appropriate for academic research context (0-25 pts)
rubric.completeness: Response covers major arguments on both sides (0-25 pts)
rubric.quality: Arguments are nuanced and cite types of evidence (0-25 pts)

hints: Ask for both pros and cons

highschool.title: Literary Analysis
highschool.objective: Write a prompt asking AI to analyze a symbol or theme from a book you're reading for English class.

rubric.clarity: Named specific book, symbol/theme, and analysis type (0-25 pts)
rubric.audience: Appropriate for high school English level (0-25 pts)
rubric.completeness: Analysis covers multiple instances and significance (0-25 pts)
rubric.quality: Insights are sophisticated and well-supported (0-25 pts)

highschool.title: SAT Practice
highschool.objective: Write a prompt asking AI to create a challenging SAT-style math problem and then explain the solution step-by-step.

rubric.clarity: Specified SAT format and desired difficulty (0-25 pts)
rubric.completeness: Problem is realistic and solution is complete (0-25 pts)

hints: Ask for strategies, not just answers

highschool.title: College Essay Feedback
highschool.objective: Write a prompt sharing a paragraph from a college application essay and asking AI for specific, constructive feedback.

rubric.clarity: Included the text and specified what feedback you want (0-25 pts)
rubric.quality: Suggestions are specific and actionable (0-25 pts)

hints: Ask about voice, structure, and impact

adult.title: Professional Email
adult.objective: Write a prompt asking AI to help draft a professional email requesting a meeting with a potential client, using a specific business context.

rubric.clarity: Provided context about your role, company, and purpose (0-25 pts)
rubric.audience: Specified the recipient and desired tone (0-25 pts)
rubric.completeness: Email includes all necessary components (0-25 pts)
rubric.quality: Tone is professional and persuasive (0-25 pts)

adult.title: Technical Documentation
adult.objective: Write a prompt asking AI to help document a process, API, or system you work with, targeting a specific audience.

rubric.clarity: Described the system and documentation needs (0-25 pts)
rubric.audience: Specified technical level of intended readers (0-25 pts)
rubric.completeness: Documentation covers key aspects systematically (0-25 pts)

adult.title: Data Analysis Assistant
adult.objective: Write a prompt asking AI to help analyze a dataset or business metrics, specifying the type of insights you need.

rubric.clarity: Described the data and analysis goals (0-25 pts)
rubric.audience: Specified business context and decisions to inform (0-25 pts)
rubric.completeness: Analysis addresses the key questions (0-25 pts)
rubric.quality: Insights are actionable and well-reasoned (0-25 pts)

hints: Specify what decisions this will inform

adult.title: Strategic Framework
adult.objective: Write a prompt asking AI to apply a business framework (SWOT, Porter's Five Forces, etc.) to analyze a real situation you're facing.

rubric.clarity: Named the framework and provided situation context (0-25 pts)
rubric.completeness: Analysis covers all framework components (0-25 pts)
rubric.quality: Insights are specific to your situation, not generic (0-25 pts)

hints: Provide real details about your situation
